string-array.name: RandomFacts
string-array.item: Magic was created by Richard Garfield in 1993 while he was attending the Pennsylvania University as a graduate student.
The Reserve List is a list of cards from magic\'s early history that will never be reprinted.
The original art that was commissioned for Magic was commissioned through a group of recent art school grads that were eager to get something published
Magic is now printed in 11 different languages!
Magic cards have their own patented and trademarked font called Beleren
Magic was lmost called Mana Clash instead of Magic: The Gathering due trademarking issues with the word Magic
